court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION Contempt Petition NO. 32 OF 2005 in Suit No. 856 of 1988 Mrs. Mary Patrica Joseph &ors. .... Petitioners. vs. Allan H. Walter Gonsalves & ors. ... Respondents. Petitioner in person. Mr. Shivanand Nandekar i/b. M. Janardhanan for applicant. Denzil D mello for respondent/ contemnor nos. 1, & 5. CORAM: A.S. Aguiar J. Date: 8 /04 /2005 P.C. Heard. Petitioner in preson states that respondent no.2 has expired. He however does not desire to proceed against the legal heirs of respondent no.2 - contemnor. Name of respondent no.2 be deleted. Leave to amend. Amendment to be carried out within one week. S.O. 3 weeks for filing affidavit in reply. (A. S.Aguiar J.)
